Description.OtherFeatures:
keeps his face covered most of the time.
has a scar across his left cheek.

CharObligation.Name: Debt
CharObligation.Notes: paid someone to help escape slavery, i still owe them.

Mod.MiscDesc: As an action, may make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Ranged (Light) check[b] to secure grappling hook to an object within medium range and reel in cord.
May pull another character aloft by making an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Athletics check[b].

gunsmiths tools

Mod.MiscDesc: Add automatic [SU] to Mechanics checks when using this item.
[B]Safety Features[b]: Add automatic [AD] to Mechanics checks made by this weapon

Character.Story:
Having been part of the Gank slaves belonging to the Hutts, Sythas is not aversed to the grittier side of Nal Shaddar. however after being recused by a criminal organization he now must pay back the money he wes as tribute to his escape.
there is large part of him that wants to free the Gank from the Hutt's control but he know that that goal is too lofty for him, and that he must take as many small victories as he can muster.
he enjoys crafting and would one day like ot settle down with his own workshop selling his works however with his debt and the constant injustice being done to his fellow gank he doesnt feel the time is right to run away and settle down.
